The video shows two people dressed in li: 2. The claims made in the Facebook posts suggest that a COVID-19 patient was nearly buried alive in Kenya's Rift Valley region.
Guidelines from Kenya: s ministry of health state that Covid-19 infected corpses are placed in tamper-proof body bags, which is not the case in the video.
Stanley Mutai: the disaster management officer in Bomet County, confirms that the claims are false and explains that the person in the video fainted after participating in a burial ceremony and was taken to the hospital for treatment.
